item.text: This is the third time I am coming to visit you. By the testimony of two or three witnesses every matter will be established.

I <st data-num="4280" class="">said before</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">when</st> I was <st data-num="3918" class="">present</st> the <st data-num="1208" class="">second time</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st>, though <st data-num="548" class="">absent</st>, I <st data-num="4302">say again</st> to those who <st data-num="4258">sinned previously</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> I <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>, I will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5339" class="">spare</st> anyone,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1893" class="">since</st> you are <st data-num="2212" class="">demanding</st> <st data-num="1382" class="">proof</st> that <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> is <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">through</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>. <st data-num="3739">He</st><n id="1" /> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="770" class="">weak</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">toward</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> is <st data-num="1414" class="">powerful</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">indeed</st> he was <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by reason of</st> <st data-num="769" class="">weakness</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> he <st data-num="2198" class="">lives</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">because of</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> are <st data-num="770" class="">weak</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> we will <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> together <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="1537">because of</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">toward</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="3985" class="">Put</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="3985">to the test</st> to see <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4102" class="">faith;</st> <st data-num="1381" class="">examine</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st>! <st data-num="2228">Or</st> do you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">recognize</st> regarding <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">you</st>—<st data-num="1487" class="">unless</st>, <st data-num="3385">indeed</st>, <st data-num="1510" class="">you</st> <st data-num="96">fail the test</st>!<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> I <st data-num="1679" class="">hope</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you will <st data-num="1097" class="">realize</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="96">failed the test</st>!<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> we <st data-num="2172" class="">pray</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> that <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> may <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">wrong</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> may <st data-num="5316" class="">appear</st> to have <st data-num="1384">passed the test</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> may <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="2570">what is right</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">even</st> if <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> may <st data-num="1510">appear</st> to have <st data-num="96">failed the test</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> do <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> only <st data-num="5228">for the sake of</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoice</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">whenever</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> are <st data-num="770" class="">weak</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1415" class="">strong</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> we <st data-num="2172" class="">pray</st> for <st data-num="3778" class="">this:</st> that <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> may become <st data-num="2676">fully qualified</st>.<n id="1" />

Because of this I am writing these things while absent, so that when I arrive I may not have to deal harshly with you by using my authority—the Lord gave it to me for building up, not for tearing down!
Finally, brothers and sisters, rejoice, set things right, be encouraged, agree with one another, live in peace, and the God of love and peace will be with you.

<n id="1" /> <st data-num="782">Greet</st> <st data-num="240" class="">one another</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> a <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="5370" class="">kiss</st>. <st data-num="3956">All</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> <st data-num="782" class="">greet</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st>.
The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ and the love of God and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with you all.
